column3: You are sneaking in unrelated cleanups again. =)\n
Moving the this->model=model below the null check is wrong. This makes the\nobject retain a stale pointer after asking it to forget the model.\n

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/f3005c82b15a73358f53420aa798b5db9f9b1f7a for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu

Why pop up a message when it is successful? In my experience in UI no news = good news. Most programs don't tell you when saving a file was successful, for example.\nFor some really critical things such as backups there may be an argument to do this, and to show some statistics about the saved data for cross-checking, but this is simply a table export...\n
